name: Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi Extra
description:
Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi Extra is an arcade game developed by CAVE Co. It came out on 22-10-2010. 5pb published the game.
You can play Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi Extra on Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
It was scored by Manabu Namiki and Ryu Umemoto.
